description: Keep your ski boots, hiking boots, and running shoes free of bulk and friction with our Men's Merino 250 Base layers 3/4 Bottom. 100% responsibly sourced Merino wool provides ultimate breathability and comfort, while a newly redesigned base layer pants fit helps reduce sag and excess fabric—perfect for your layering needs.
name: Smartwool Classic All-Season Merino 155 Base Layer 3/4 Bottoms - Mens
